DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study identify orofacial difficulty maternal breastfeeding rooming-in .
DOC.detailed_description: Cross-sectional quantitative study sample consist 28 dyad present rooming-in Assis Chateaubriand School Motherhood August December 2009 .
DOC.criteria: mother newborn participate study , regardless gender , ethnic and/or age . newborn present oropharyngelarynx structural abnormality , impossibility feed mouth and/or expose bilispot .
